title: Why hasn't Clash team signups opened yet? It said today on the Clash tutorial page.
body:
It said that team creation begins on May 20th and games start on May 25th. https://i.imgur.com/mh9UeFF.png

There should be a tab next to Collections that says Clash or Competitive right? https://i.imgur.com/JGc22G0.png

replies.body: With the Clash release happening globally and simultaneously, it meant that for Oceania the release was later in the day.  Should be there and viewable now!  If there is any weirdness, try restarting the client and lemme know
